articles.description: Follow live coverage of day 12 of the French Open at Roland Garros.
articles.title: French Open LIVE: Skupski, Krawczyk, Gauff, Swiatek - scores, radio and live text

articles.description: Premier League clubs meet to discuss whether to keep or scrap VAR from next season, plus reaction to international games and Euro 2024 build-up as England and Scotland prepare to name their final 26-man squads.
articles.title: Premier League clubs vote on VAR, plus Euro 2024 build-up as squad deadline looms

articles.description: James Maddison will not be included in England's 26-man squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: James Maddison: Midfielder cut from England squad for Euro 2024

articles.description: The International Cricket Council has no plans to move T20 World Cup matches out of New York despite concerns over poor pitches.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: India voice New York pitch concerns but ICC stands firm

articles.description: Mark Clattenburg stepped down from his role at Nottingham Forest just three months after his appointment.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Mark Clattenburg says analyst role "did more harm than good"

articles.description: England second row Rosie Galligan tells BBC Sport how a breast reduction six years ago helped her sporting career.
articles.title: Rosie Galligan: England rugby player explains how breast reduction helped sporting career

articles.description: Wales call up Scarlets centre Eddie James to the squad preparing for summer games against South Africa and Australia.
articles.title: Wales rugby: Gatland calls up Scarlets centre Eddie James

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he will do his best to return to the court "as soon as possible" after undergoing surgery on a knee injury.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic 'will do best to return soon' after undergoing knee surgery

articles.description: Coco Gauff says she needs to "find a better way" of playing Iga Swiatek before the pair meet in the French Open semi-finals on Thursday.
articles.title: French Open preview: Coco Gauff meets Iga Swiatek in semi-final

articles.description: Scottish Cup-winning former captain David Gray is appointed Hibernian head coach on a three-year deal.
articles.title: Hibernian: David Gray appointed head coach on three-year deal
